ParameterFields.Name: Prerequisite Switch
ParameterFields.ToolTip: If this is not set to 255, then this switch must be set before this trigger region becomes active.

ParameterFields.Name: Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
'Set and Unset' will set its 'Switch to Set' when the player enters the region, and unset it when the player leaves the region.
'Only Set' will set it, but never unset it.
